website_summaries.verdict: One of the best full-face snorkel masks on the market, this is comfortable to wear and easy to breathe in.
pros: Can be worn comfortably for hours without aggravating pressure points on the face
Excellent airflow, even in choppy water or with strenuous swimming
Mask frame is guaranteed not to fog
cons: Seals or straps may loosen after a few uses

customer_reviews.title: I have tried 3 versions of full-face masks, this is the best one...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 versions of full-face masks, and this is my favorite. Why? The comfort of the fit around the face. All designs put pressures on various parts of the face. It's different, odd, and takes getting used to. Most of the others put pressure on your high cheek bone. This one puts pressures on the lower jaw more than the cheek. I find this more comfy for longer periods. I also found the face gasket bigger and softer than others. Also, the snorkel is easier to attach and remove, but I hope it doesn't fall off! That's my only concern, since it seems less secure than others. Overall, this is my best pick of the litter...
customer_reviews.author: Waikiki

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! Purchased it for half the price online rather than local surf shops. It fits my husband's and my face. We originally bought it for him because he has a full faced beard and it worked great for him. It doesn't fog at all, if any water leaks in the mask, which was rare it left with your breath out the bottom. Also didn't add the stress on your mouth holding onto a snorkel and clearing. We will definitely buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Billie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Buy It - Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 3 different brands of masks for a recent snorkeling/scalloping trip - this mask by far was the family favorite. Easy to use, great visibility underwater, no distortion of depth or hindrance in diving to retrieve scallops in 6-8 foot of water. No leaking experienced, adjusted easily to various family member's head sizes (we ordered small - tried by 2 men, 2 women, no children) and the snorkel closed and cleared perfectly when diving under water. We will order 2 more of these for future use and recommend spending the few extra dollars for this quality mask. You do look goofy, but the ease and comfort of this mask allowed for extended time to enjoy the water and sea-life.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a great impact these have on your snorkeling experience!
customer_reviews.text: I took a pair of these down to Mexico to try them out for the first time. I've been snorkeling for years and these are BY FAR the best I've used. Water pretty much stays out of your face and breathing without a mouthpiece is great. Snorkel doesn't let water in and I didn't have much of a problem with fogging either. These type masks are becoming very popular where we were (Akumal), as lots of people had them. A great buy, operates as designed. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: NDJollyMon

customer_reviews.title: Taking water after using it three times
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my wife to do some snorkeling. It's comfortable to wear and it has an interesting design. The problem is that after using it three times it started to take water (it worked perfectly before), we tried to adjusted it without success and we give up (the straps are kind of flimsy). The other problem with this kind of mask is that they can be very painful if you like to dive (squeeze over your forehead because of the trapped air).
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Payret

customer_reviews.title: Ready for vacation!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this type of full face mask on a friend's recommendation. There are many brands to chose, but Ocean Reef Aria is one of two or three top brands. Although other brands might be cheaper, I'll assume you get what you pay for. The seal is perfect. Tried it in our pool. No leaks. Snorkel is positioned perfectly. Try as I might, I could not get it leak. Very fast learning curve. Much easier that old style mask and snorkel. Biggest challenge for anyone might be deciding on fit/size. Clear field of vision.
customer_reviews.author: CDPAR

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after first use
customer_reviews.text: Product worked the first time and then started leaking. It leaked so bad that I could not breath thru it anymore. Basically you only get one good days use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for this mask. I was excited after reading the reviews, but this one is not for me. I think it runs a bit small. I am a petite woman, with a small head. I ordered the S/M size. It did not seem to fit well and put pressure on my chin. Just wearing it around the house caused it to fog up. I also felt that it was difficult to breathe through. The snorkel was also really hard to remove. I ended up buying a cheaper mask, with a foldable snorkel, that was much easier to breathe through.
customer_reviews.author: Reed Dreier

customer_reviews.title: Best Mask Period Until...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mask for my trip to Jamaica it is amazing love being able to breathe normally underwater and literally see everything. I will never use a regular mask again!! Big thing with me is fog experienced none with this mask. Only issue is today I went out and the mask started leaking I don't know what the problem is I've tried everything but it keeps leaking so it only lasted me 3 days hopefully I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: These were great masks while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These were great masks while they lasted. We brought them to Cancun the summer of 2017 and they worked flawlessly. When we returned, we stored them in a cool, dark closet for several months. Nine months later we decided to take the kids to Hawaii for spring break. Two out of the four masks began leaking immediately. It appears the circular silicone filters on the inside of the masks had warped and water was leaking into the bottom of the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Tom_California

customer_reviews.title: Hard to breathe
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Snorkel mask about 2 months ago and finally got to try it out. The mask is of decent quality and fit fine when I put it on. Had no problem breathing when I put it on at home. When I got into the water, it was a different story, my wife and I both had a hard time breathing through the mask. It felt like you were breathing through a straw that was too small to let enough air in. On top of that, the mask started fogging up, even after we applied an anti-fogging agent. Its too late to return the mask now. I regret buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed shallow water snorkeling with this mask
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great. It doesn't fog up. It leaked some around the face (I have a beard), but the water management directs water to the bottom and out the one-way valve. As others have noted, these type of masks are really only for shallow water or surface snorkeling. You can't dive very far with them due to the large volume of the mask and pressure against the face. Even if you try to blow out to compensate, you can't get to your nose to equalize. The mask has tightening pull-straps at the bottom which need to be re-tightened periodically.
customer_reviews.author: John Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: The best snorkel mask out there. I recently went to the French Caribbean and everyone there had similar (cheap) masks. This one is very well built, comes from a reputable company, and looks more like a tool than a toy. My friends and I stayed in the water over 3 hours one day and they were having all kinds of problems with their standard snorkels and masks. This was so easy to use. Just breathe how you want; through your nose or mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask.
customer_reviews.text: Felt like paying the extra money made the difference. I read a lot of reviews and almost bought other brands. The biggest concerns with the other brands were the size of the breathing tube from reading all the other reviews from other mask. This mask has it all. Large enough tube for me to be able to breath with confort. Comfortable enough for me to even talk while wearing it. Ocean Reef was an excellent brand. My main concern was them foggin up and they did not at all.
customer_reviews.author: H. Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy. If you are wondering about trying one of these but are unsure, i can assure you they are not the way to go. Researched alot to find the best rated full face mask ect. Before i purchased. It made me very sick, first like i was short of breath, then extremely nauseous ruined my snorkel trip. If i wasnt young and in good shape i feel like i could have been in danger of drowning in fact
customer_reviews.author: Joe smith

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend trying it on
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately I am one of those one that my size ends right in the middle. So I had ordered the medium/large, and it seems a tad too large. I bet if I had ordered the small/medium it would have been a tad too small... I really recommend trying it on, especially if you are like me and fall right in the middle of 2 sizes. It is also a little bulky when trying to pack light. Also if you have a beard or if you are un-shaved (like I am usually while on vacation) it doesn't work well... If you have a baby skin then it may work well :) I ended up using my old goggles and tuba.
customer_reviews.author: Cosnomate

customer_reviews.title: ... clip connecting snorkel to mask is not at all easy to get off and when I did finally get ...
customer_reviews.text: The clip connecting snorkel to mask is not at all easy to get off and when I did finally get it off it was broken.. The TRIBORD has a much easier mechanism
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Gread concept if it does not leak.  The tube cannot be removed so hard to pack for travel
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good mask but it leak the first time I used it. I did not have the chance to use it until after the 30 days return period. Once you put the tube on the mask, it is impossible to remove it, so if you travel it will be hassle to pack the mask with the tube on it.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mask with minimal leakage and no fogging.
customer_reviews.text: First saw this full face snorkel mask for rent/sale in a shop in Hawaii. The shop said their customers were pleased with it and it got good reviews on Amazon so I decided to try it. I've only used it twice - first time just to check it out in the local pool and then on a recent cruise in the Caribbean. I found it quite comfortable and did not notice any leaks or fogging. In the Caribbean, I did notice it seemed to make my head more buoyant but I have to say breathing is more comfortable than a standard mouth snorkel and visibility is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fite

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to breathe
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask 3 times and found it very difficult to breathe. On the 3rd use, the snorkel came off and I was unable to retrieve it. If I had not lost the snorkel, I probably would have returned the mask.
customer_reviews.author: April Warford

customer_reviews.title: Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: Snorkle tube is not large enough diameter to allow normal breathing. I found I was having to "suck" air into my lungs to get enough air through snorkle. I thought it might just be me, so I had my daughter try it and she had the same effect. This wears you out trying to get enough air into your lungs. Lack of fogging and clarity of vision is great.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alter

customer_reviews.title: LEADER OF THE PACK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask along with Tribord Easybreath Full Face Snorkeling Mask and the Seaview 180 for a family trip to the Cayman Islands. This mask performed the best. A little water did get on occasion but no big deal. There was no fogging at all with this mask. I recommend totally.
customer_reviews.author: NHGUY

customer_reviews.title: You won't go back to a normal mask for snorkeling again.
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time in Loreto, Mexico - the experience is fantastic. The field of view and comfort is a world apart from a traditional mask/snorkel set up. It's very easy to take on and off quickly and I did not experience any fogging at all. The only gripe I have is that the stem snorkel snaps on easily and you're ready to go...but it was super tough to disconnect. I did not want to break it, so I packed it home together. I'll need to figure that out (!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it, it leaked. As a matter of fact, I cannot get it to stop leaking. I will therefore need to replace this and lose my investment. I am not saying that all of their masks leak, I only know that the one that I bought does. I will be looking for another brand. (It has been too long since I purchased it to get a refund even though I have only worn it once in a swimming pool preparing for a snorkeling trip.)
customer_reviews.author: disappointed in Indy

customer_reviews.title: Changed my snorkeling life
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I made for my trip to the Galapagos. We snorkeled every day and I NEVER had to defog my mask, NEVER had water in my mouth or eyes. It was easy on and off. This is the bomb and is worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D.

customer_reviews.title: Will Never Snorkel Without These Again!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these (one black, one orange) before our cruise. After reading the reviews for them, I wanted them to be good but wasn't hopeful because of there being quite a few negative reviews. Well, we used them this past week in Cozumel, and they were AWESOME! Never fogged up, never leaked a drop of water, easy to take on/off and adjust, great viewing width, great carrying bag. We've been fighting with regular eye/nose masks for years, and these were a complete game changer. Never again will we use anything but these.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Earles

customer_reviews.title: Small plastic clips that attach snorkel to mask broke with days.
customer_reviews.text: The mask seemed to work well for snorkeling but we’ve only used it once, however, one of the small plastic clips on the snorkel that keep it in place on the mask has already broken. See,s they need better way to attach/detach the snorkel from the mask. For $89 you would expect better quality. Not happy that it’s already broken.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalyn W.

customer_reviews.title: This mask will change your life.
customer_reviews.text: Totally changed my view on snorkeling. I am not a water lover and snorkeling made me very nervous. After using this mask, I am much more comfortable in the water. You can see so much more and you can breath thru your nose and mouth. No more water in the mouth peice either.
customer_reviews.author: bccomputerguy

customer_reviews.title: Good visibility and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good visibility and easy to use. Overall, I like this mask. The only negatives are that it's a little harder to breathe through (but not a real problem) and takes a minute to wipe the inside under the folds for cleaning after salt water use. But performs as advertised and I bought a second for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: John Burkhalter

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: I have been snorkeling for years and have had many masks but this mask is NOT safe. It has restricted air flow and you are breathing in bad air. I do not recommend this mask at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product from the best brand on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, the best Full Face Snorkel on the market hands down. Absolutely no fogging what so ever. When you swim under water you do get that full face pressure though, it does take some getting use to. You would still have this pressure with normal Goggles they would just be around your eyes instead of the full face. So it's completely acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling made comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This has changed snorkelling for me and the wife. No more biting down on a mouthpiece, or having to forcefully purge in order to breathe. Thanks to this mask, I have found out I can equalise without having to block my nose, allowing me to dive deeper than the recommended 3m. Don't get caught out by other imitators and their cheaper product, this can make or break a day in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Other products do the job at half the price
customer_reviews.text: The product is too over priced for its functions and design compared to other products on the market. The main reason i bought this is because sometimes when i snorkel i like to dive a bit ( 2m under ) ao i purchased it based on the reviw of a guy who said that u can but it trun out u cant, i would recommend to get another product which is around half the price of these
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: This mask would be perfect and I would give it five stars if I ...
customer_reviews.text: This mask would be perfect and I would give it five stars if I could figure out how to remove the snorkel from the mask without potentially breaking it. Ill likely be sending it back if I cannot figure out how to remove the snorkel :(
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Used this on Maui and had easy snorkeling experiences. We should have bought masks like these a long time ago! Yes, the breathing tube will not allow water to flow in, which is handy if you get hit by a wave or want to swim a few feet below water level to see turtles.
customer_reviews.author: HAL

customer_reviews.title: It does not fog up!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a cheap full face mask a couple years ago on Groupon for about $30 and it was a waste of money. If fogged-up and I was not able to use it for my trip. I was skeptical in purchasing this $70 Aria face mask and even more skeptical when I received it. I put it on and I thought there is no way this thing is going to stay clear. Much to my surprise I spent two hours snorkeling in the Keys with absolutely zero issues. This is an amazing face mask and I would suggest everyone try it!
customer_reviews.author: Experience Adele (Andrea)

customer_reviews.title: Never leaks!
customer_reviews.text: This mask was great! It never leaks and it only fogged up once and I put some of the recommended bottle of "spit" and then it never fogged up again for the 17 days in Hawaii while we snorkeled. It gives you more air than some of the other brands. You can talk too! Wow look at that fish!!!! I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun mask. Love it’s features and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it’s suppose to. Simple to blow out water and has great features for submersion. Great for pool or real snorkeling. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marius Morosanu

customer_reviews.title: it didn't ever fog up and the viability was better than a regular snorkel mask
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a snorkelling trip to Curacao. We used it 10 times. Pros: it didn't ever fog up and the viability was better than a regular snorkel mask. Cons: it leaked some and wasn't as comfortable across your face as a different brand mask we also purchased. Even with that being said, the mask is still 100x better than the traditional snorkelling mask.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGuckin

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: The mask fits very well, visual field excellent. Even though not recommended, nephew with beard put on (similar size face so the measurement does matter) without leaks. Cannot say enough about the lack of fogging and how snorkel spout works perfectly. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: JMLewis

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling made fun again
customer_reviews.text: I have a small face but the small adult fit perfecting. Why did this product take so long to come out? This mask makes snorkeling enjoyable again. Great view and comfortable and can talk easily to your snorkel buddy. Doesn't fog and easy to clean. Snorkel doesn't fill with water when a wave comes over. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Stoupper

customer_reviews.title: Everyone on the trip wanted to use it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for a trip to Hawaii. I was skeptical as it looked kind of odd. I must save everyone loved this mask and I ended up lending it out to less experienced snorkelers and they wouldn't give it back. No problem as I had a spare mask but I highly recommend this mask for casual snorkeling. Worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and it works
customer_reviews.text: I used it in the Bahamas and it was amazing to be able to see the fish and use the mask without worrying about a mouth piece. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first seen this last year in Hawaii and almost bought one. I just purchased for a up coming trip to the gulf and tried it today in a pool and was blown away. This mask is fantastic! Most masks leak on me due to the size of my face and nose, this is perfect. When diving down the mask pushes harder on your face making the seal even better. When surfacing you breath as normal, no clearing the snorkel. I just ordered another for my son and I highly recommend. Can't wait to use it in the gulf.
customer_reviews.author: Jay McKimmy

customer_reviews.title: Snorkeling in St Thomas
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old. We did some snorkeling in the US Virgin Islands on spring break. Took some coaching and a little practice but it ended up working out great. A standard snorkel wasn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Value, and a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is everything that I could have asked for. With a slight case of COPD it is wonderful. Being able to breath through your mouth as well your nose, without fogging up is GREAT!! It is a great product. ARIA should be proud of this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried regular snorkel gear and full-face masks. None of them fit right and all of them leaked. Finally one that fits my face and lets me enjoy the water again. A good snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: L. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: This is a very well designed product!
customer_reviews.text: This mask works extremely well for me. I tried it in a lake and it allowed me to breathe easier than the old fashioned mask/snorkle combination. Submerging completely was very easy and the valve does its job nicely. Can't wait to use it on an upcoming trip to the Caribbean!
customer_reviews.author: A. Angen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these. Fit great. Work great. Don’t fill with water. Easy to use. Comfortable to breathe. My husband now enjoys snorkeling!
customer_reviews.author: Diane R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mask.
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! I have purchased other brands but none are as nice as the Ocean Reef mask. no leaks, fog free, fits great, and soft seals. The 2 cheap mask I purchased before this both leaked and hurt my face. If you want a quality full face snorkel mask buy the Ocean Reef mask you will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: dan middleton

customer_reviews.title: Design gives bigger views!
customer_reviews.text: This mask was the best purchase ever. Very easy to use and the viewing area on this mask lets you see better. The seller sent this mask in one day and we couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Black-Mowery

customer_reviews.title: Super fun idea, doesn’t work in practice.
customer_reviews.text: It was so much fun! Until the join where the snorkel attaches to the face mask started leaking and a slow drip of saltwater cut short any attempted outings.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Van Wormer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than traditional snorkel gear
customer_reviews.text: The seal this makes on my face is amazing, especially better if you have some facial hair lol
customer_reviews.author: Dynette

customer_reviews.title: Best ever mask!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome face mask! Such a broader view. Snorkel is above, so nothing in your mouth. Kept my face dry all day. Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Jo Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! You need to put it on correctly and make sure your hair is out of the mask. I love not having a snorkel in my mouth. Doesn't fog!! Which is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER R

customer_reviews.title: Fits the face very Well on the face and feel comfortable. I have problems with my jaw(TMJ) so its ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after reading all the reviews from other people. Fits the face very Well on the face and feel comfortable. I have problems with my jaw(TMJ) so its hard to use traditional snorkel gear which out getting sore after an hour snorkeling. I can't wait to try it for real on our hawaii trip coming up. Will update review on how it works in a month.
customer_reviews.author: A Stout

customer_reviews.title: Good for people that have never snorkled.
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised but if you are already used to a normal mask and snorkel you may not like it as much. Do not use it if think you free dive down more than 10 feet, it puts a lot of pressure on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit hard to get a secure tight fit. Unfortunately had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Jacksonville

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: A full face mask when snorkeling! the best. You can see everything.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good. You ca breath easily. But for me didnt work, it Give me dizziness.
customer_reviews.author: patirucha21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wasn't sure if I would like snorkeling at all, until I came across these full face snorkel mask. My first time ever snorkeling was a blast because of this snorkel mask...
customer_reviews.author: DK Hawk

customer_reviews.title: you wont be dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved this mask. We took it to Kauai and it worked perfectly. A great upgrade to me normal snorkel mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Busch

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mask, but not better than competitors
customer_reviews.text: This mask felt slightly small for an adult female, but I really had no issues while using it. There was a tiny amount of leakage, but that did not cause any problems. Masks of similar design but significantly less cost performed just as well, and some members in our group preferred the fit of the Jogoo S/M mask.
customer_reviews.author: LTFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Great Snorkeling Mask for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I saw these everywhere while we were vacationing in Grand Cayman. We got one for our 8 year old daughter as we plan to take her snorkeling next summer. She loves it and it works great! It's a great mask for beginners. :)
customer_reviews.author: textekvball

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I ordered small/medium and fit great for both of us! Easy to use and would recommend this buy to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Afton

customer_reviews.title: Truly enjoyed the snorkeling experience more than ever with the full ...
customer_reviews.text: A little more expensive than some of the competitors products, but I had confidence in this one. Truly enjoyed the snorkeling experience more than ever with the full face version. Breathing was effortless with both nasal and mouth breathing available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask for snorkeling! Great field of view, and I love being able to breathe through my nose and talk to my wife. But you should note: there is no nose access for equalizing your ears. This is a surface mask only. You will risk damaging your ears if you skin dive.
customer_reviews.author: jason burt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was so well worth the value!! I went snorkeling and did not want to use the rentals they had available at the resorts. So I packed my own. This was Perfect to breath, Perfect to see, fit fantastic!!!! I had no problem with water getting in my mask. LOVE LOVED IT !!!! thank you
customer_reviews.author: nekii

customer_reviews.title: High quality piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: High quality piece of equipment. Constructed a bit different but better than the run-of-the-mill Tribords here. The rubber and plastics look precisely cut. There is a little bit of air striking the eyes on exhale, so the rubber covering the nose should have a redesign. The mask does not fog up and that' probably the biggest merit.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: This is the best snorkel I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best snorkel I have ever used. Everyone on our cruise was asking about it. No leaks, great visibility and lets you breath through nose or mouth, which are both separated from eye area so no fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: tremendously helped with my training
customer_reviews.text: I use it mainly as an aid to help me train in swimming. I've been an avid runner, and as with any sport, suffered from it's inevitable side-effect, injury to my lower back. It helped me get back to swimming as an alternative to my road treks. It helps me maintain a good balance and maintain confidence in the water. I have not used it snorkeling but I think every swim club should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Aries L.

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong with these, spend the money
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I ever owned. Snorkeled for over an hour without having to lift my head and clear or defog the thing. Field of view is great, anti fogging is great, clarity is great. The only minor issue was having it close off on me once while I was still trying to get the fit right, never had an issue once I got it on right
customer_reviews.author: Phillip J Reno

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone who struggles with headaches from tight masks ...
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend to anyone who struggles with headaches from tight masks or has leaking problems with masks that fit smaller faces. Snorkeled for hours without having to worry about leaks or condensation.
customer_reviews.author: 99hedys

customer_reviews.title: Stop searching. This mask fits and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Stop searching.. I was trying to find the perfect mask and this is it. The sizes are correct I'm 5'10" 190 lbs and lrg xl fit great and worked great even with a two week full face beard. Like I said it's the one your looking for. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Spent hours finding shells
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. First used a borrowed one, then decided i had to have my own. Probably used it for 15 hours over the course of a week. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All I can say is, wow. You won't ...
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, wow. You won't be sorry about the purchase. We bought one for our 6 y/o daughter and it actually helped her learn to be a stronger, more confident swimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Captain

customer_reviews.title: This mask is awesome. It never fogged up once on me
customer_reviews.text: This mask is awesome. It never fogged up once on me. Everyone I was with wanted to try it out and they too saw how awesome it was. It's nice not having to bit into the snorkel tube and being able to just breathe. My whole family is going to buy one of these for our next vacation to the tropics.
customer_reviews.author: jimiDMBthing

customer_reviews.title: One step removed from actually scuba diving!!!! (still gotta come up once in a while for air !!!)
customer_reviews.text: If you have never tried a full face snorkel before this one is the way to start.......you will never won't to put a mouth piece in your mouth again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: I bought snorkel mask before but Aria is the best one so far
customer_reviews.text: It fits me perfectly. I bought snorkel mask before but Aria is the best one so far. It did not leak or fog and I was in the water for a long time. The only thing I noticed was it gives me headache. It's probably from not breathing normally for a long time. Overall I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jann

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wore this on our beach vacation in Maui. We were able to see all the fish and turtles and no leaks. Easy to use and clean. Highly recommended it!
customer_reviews.author: BZMA2

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE MASKS
customer_reviews.text: Finally - a mask that made me more comfortable in the water.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Akers

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I took the measurements and when I got the mask it was too big around the chin and water kept on coming in.
customer_reviews.author: nancy ct.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Will not snorkel without. I bought 4 more for my family.
customer_reviews.author: giuseppe ferrara

customer_reviews.title: ok, Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not the best Quality but they do work and like that set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changing snorkel
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for our vacation. They’re a game changer for sure. We spent a lot more time snorkeling and it was way more enjoyable
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Mask is easier to adjust and breathe...
customer_reviews.text: Mask met expectations...full views underwater... much easier breathing w/o having to clamp down on a mouthpiece...very pleased...
customer_reviews.author: Ra

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MASK!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT MASK!!! Fits comfortable and no mess with the snorkel. I live on an island so this mask is perfect. Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Herley

customer_reviews.title: Mask works great!
customer_reviews.text: Mask works great. Just like advertised. Never got any salt water in my nose or mouth. Easy to breath. The only negative is that snorkel should be easier to remove for storage and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Repsol91

customer_reviews.title: ... on you tube and they said this was the best so I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Review this on you tube and they said this was the best so I bought it,just came back from Hawaii and it worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: djo593

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 different brands of snorkel masks and this is by far the best. Even keeps a good seal with a beard. Built very well, and doesn't fog up at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Collins

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Snorkel but cannot easily take off the vent
customer_reviews.text: Thing worked very well but when it was time to leave and get back on the plan, i tried to remove the vent from mask and it was difficult and i ended up breaking one of the plastic clips that keep it in place. Hoping that doesn't affect the use when i put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No leaks easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Using it in swim spa. It’s awesome. Just put your head down and swim. Breathing is restricted a bit though 😬.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffin F.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Water can go in side ! Only good for snokiling
customer_reviews.author: Gul Vasikova

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: We love these full face mask. Very easy to use and fun.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Best snorkel mask yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this snorkel mask!! I've always hated the mouth piece on traditional masks. This one is perfect for me. Not water leaking in, great viewing visibility and no mouthpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Wahine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the way this worked! I hate swallowing saltwater or having it in my eyes.....this mask worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Devlin

customer_reviews.title: I can use this without panic attacks
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit(I am a petite woman), easy to use, personally, I don't like snorkel masks, but this is quite tolerable. Very easy to breathe through nose or mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I had to purchase a medium because the large was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Baudry

customer_reviews.title: Strap are bad after only one month f use.
customer_reviews.text: Straps slip badly so we had to tigh them off so that we could use the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use it in the Gulf
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it fits so you can see so much more than regular snorkle eyewear
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Westfall, Westfall

product_meta.title: Ocean Reef Aria Full Face Snorkeling Mask
product_meta.description: For snorkeling enthusiasts who don't like the traditional snorkels, you'll be able to breathe easy with the Ocean Reef Aria Full Face Snorkeling Mask. This ingenious mask covers your entire face and lets you breathe the way you do naturally, using both nose and mouth. Your breath, like the defroster function in your motor vehicle, will circulate to the mask lens, eliminating fogging. The mask offers a wide field of view so you can take in everything below the surface. Your whole face stays dry thanks to comprehensive coverage, and the snorkel tube is integrated into the top of the Ocean Reef Aria Full Face Snorkeling Mask, keeping water out.
feature_bullets: 180 PANORAMIC VIEW - get a better view of life under the surface with a wider field of vision. The full face mask design sits further back on the face, allowing for unprecedented peripheral vision compared to traditional snorkel masks.

DRY TOP SNORKEL - explore sea life with confidence knowing you won't be surprised by a gulp of water from a wave. The dry-top snorkel protects the airway from crashing waves, saving the snorkeler from distractions.
PURGE VALVE - For the daring snorkeler that wants to go below the surface, easily clear excess water from the mask with a quick exhale
UNRESTRICTED BREATHING - Internal ventilation allows for ease of breath while allowing everyone to breath through the nose, or mouth, or both.
FOG FREE - the ability to both inhale and exhale within the mask naturally keeps the sight free of fog with the use for expensive defog.
